wikipedia_page.main: Angela Clarke (born 1969 in Liverpool, Lancashire) is an English actress best known for playing Colette Daly in the television drama series Soldier Soldier. She has also appeared in Brookside, Coronation Street, Liverpool 1, The Bill, Pie in the Sky, Family Affairsand Casualty.She is the younger sister of actress Margi Clarke, with whom she appeared in the films Letter to Brezhnev (1985) and Blonde Fist (1991), and screenwriter Frank Clarke (Brookside and Letter to Brezhnev).
